https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sD9Z8d78JhYQyV2EXVwx7VSu8e8.jpg In 1944, two prisoners miraculously escaped from Auschwitz. They told the world of the horror of the Holocaust and raised one of the greatest moral questions of the 20th century. 1944: Should We Bomb Auschwitz?
